definitions.definition: Passed on as an inheritance , by last will or intestate.
Of a title, honor or right: legally granted to somebody's descendant after that person's death.
examples: Duke is a hereditary title which was created in Norman times.

definitions.definition: Of a person: holding a legally hereditary title or rank.
Of a disease or trait: passed from a parent to offspring in the genes .
examples: Haemophilia is hereditary in his family.

definitions.definition: Of a ring : such that all submodules of projective modules over the ring are also projective.

main_definition: Passed on as an inheritance , by last will or intestate.
secondary_definitions: Of a title, honor or right: legally granted to somebody's descendant after that person's death.
Of a person: holding a legally hereditary title or rank.
Of a disease or trait: passed from a parent to offspring in the genes .
( mathematics ) Of a ring : such that all submodules of projective modules over the ring are also projective.
